item.title: My workflow for posts
item.description: How the site is updated Here I describe the steps to get a new post on the site. This will serve as my reference for future work. Prepare images in Lightroom After doing the initial image adjustment I tag them such that they are included in my collection for web. The selected images is exported in smaller dimension and compressed format suitable for the web. The export is saved as a template with image processing settings and export location within my local git working folder.
